items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
items.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

items.content_html: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
items.title: harpia-framework/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

items.content_html: Video BG Remover is a lightweight npm library that leverages TensorFlow.js and MediaPipe Selfie Segmentation to remove or replace video backgrounds in real time. It also provides functionality to record the processed video and download it—all with a simple API.
items.title: azizaydi23/video-bg-remover: Video BG Remover is a lightweight npm library that leverages TensorFlow.js and MediaPipe Selfie Segmentation to remove or replace video backgrounds in real time. It also provides functionality to record the processed video and download it—all with a simple API.
